name: Painted Armwraps
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It decreases the users constitution pitifully.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
